QuestData.Title: Whispers in the Wind
QuestData.Description: You hear dem, $c? De voices from de cave. Dey want to talk, but dey ain't got no breath.$B$BLet's find a way to listen. De Twilight's Hammer, dey talk to de wind. Go to de Twilight Breach south of here, and grab de Windspeaker Charm from de camp. It'll be atop a stone pillar.$B$BWe'll need us de breath of the elementals, too! Slay de Storm Vortexes and take what joo need.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect a Windspeaker charm and 5 Breath of the Vortex.
QuestData.RewardText: Dat's de stuff, mon!$B$BNow can you hear dem? De spirits, dey be talkin', but dey say nothing nice.$B$BLet us bring dem to de light.
